text: <@U0P2GSA8Z>: regarding scalability... there are many other dimensions that you aren't listing... number and distribution of transactors, amount of decentralization, ... the scalability dimensions will likely be dependent on the particular optimization point that is being targeted by the project. Would it make sense for each project to describe its criteria for technical maturity?
hi, I had a comment on that section that stated that the list needed to be completed
somehow I don't see any of my comments anymore
do you see any comments from me?
I would agree with you that this is yet another aspect that probably can't be set for all projects
i can see comments from @christofera but thats all
that's it, somehow all my comments disappeared
what a pain
unfortunately this isn't the first time I have problems with Google Docs
I'll try to recreate those
<@U0P2GSA8Z>: i see the comment you just added
that's good but the question is whether it will stick this time!
ok, I put back the three comments I had put in initially
you can see one of them touches on the point you raised
my goal with these comments were to provide additional insight and highlight some open issues
Feel free to answer or add your own comments as you see fit
hopefully they won't get lost...
I just added my comment as well... and thanks for documenting this!
you're welcome

<!channel>: if you have comments on the exit criteria draft, you're free to send them whichever way you prefer but the best is to put them in the document so that they can all be found in the same place and don't risk getting lost (well, assuming Google Docs doesn't screw up again! :-/)
And keep in mind that suggesting specific changes to the document are the most effective way to move us forward.
Thanks! :slightly_smiling_face:
